==Japanese==

===Pronoun===
{{ja-pos|pronoun|た}}

# interrogative personal pronoun; [[who]]

===Pronoun===
{{ja-pos|pronoun|たれ}}

# interrogative personal pronoun; [[who]]
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|614}}
#*: '''Tare'''. タレ (誰) 誰. 例, '''Tare'''ga maittaca. l, '''tare'''ca maitta. (誰が参つたか. まはは, 誰か参つた) 誰が来たか. '''Tare''' naritomo. (誰なりとも) 誰であろうとも.

===Etymology===
From earlier /tare/. The voicing of the initial /t-/ to /d-/ is likely due to analogy to the interrogative demonstrative {{m|ja|何処|tr=doko}}.

===Pronoun===
{{ja-pos|pronoun|だれ}}

# interrogative personal pronoun; [[who]]
